issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When including a watchOS framework to our watchOS target, the build fails because the CLI tries to parse a compiled (binary) plist which shouldn't be checked. The easy but powerful fix is to not check plist files inside frameworks but still copy them.
fields.summary: watchOS: Including watchOS framework causing build error

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/11469

Testing steps: Honestly, use our app to test it. The setup is pretty advanced otherwise.

Closing ticket

The compiled plist is no longer attempted to be parsed, encountered and filed TIMOB-27768 while testing this. TIMOB-27757 is still an issue here also, but the issue for this ticket is fixed

SDK: 9.0.0.v20200212155006
